description: CashYourAds provides innovative phone advertisement services.  We have enabled new advertisement service workflows through patent-pending marketing processes in place. We provide global coverage and strive hard to maintain the same level of quality and efficiency for these services.   AdExpress, for mobile phones, is our signature advertisement service that provides real-time location-based sales or promotional feeds. Download AdExpress for devices such as Android, BlackBerry, Palm, iPhone etc. and view advertisements with the click of a button. Mobile users have the option to filter preferred advertisements by signing up and choosing preferred categories such as books, travel, electronics etc.
